body:
Hi Everybody,



I imported some buildings from an urban landscape from GIS to Rhino. 

The buildings are located in their real locations (x,y). I need to use the real time radiation analysis tool. I set the breps but the tool does not work. However, when I move those buildings to the 0,0 coordinate, the tool works. How can I fix this? 

P.S. the building layer is attached.



thanks,

Mehdi
topic: I imported my buildings from GIS; Real Time Radiation Analysis Doesn't Work; Coordinate problem
